attributes.action: abolish the absurdity of  government by mandatory coalition in Northern Ireland and ensure true democratic government in all parts of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Government by mandatory coalition is inherently undemocratic because it makes no provision for the essential of an opposition to hold the government to account and does not allow the electorate to vote a party out of office.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
